scripts.package: rushx bump && rm -rf ./dist && cp -r ../desktop/dist . && cp ../desktop/.env ./dist && echo 'done'
scripts.dist: cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false NODE_ENV=production VERSION=$(node ../common/scripts/show_tag.js) MODEL_VERSION=$(node ../common/scripts/show_version.js) electron-builder build -p onTag
scripts.dist-local: cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false NODE_ENV=production VERSION=$(node ../common/scripts/show_tag.js) MODEL_VERSION=$(node ../common/scripts/show_version.js) electron-builder build
scripts.dist-signed: cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=true NODE_ENV=production VERSION=$(node ../common/scripts/show_tag.js) MODEL_VERSION=$(node ../common/scripts/show_version.js) electron-builder build -c.afterSign=scripts/notarize.js -p onTag
scripts.dist-mac-win: cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false NODE_ENV=production VERSION=$(node ../common/scripts/show_tag.js) MODEL_VERSION=$(node ../common/scripts/show_version.js) electron-builder build --windows --x64
